vecHighlight.strDescription: Hit the trashcan cop with the can.

vecUnachieved.strDescription: Kill five barnacles with one explosive barrel.
Get the Gravity Gun in Black Mesa East.
Use the Antlions to kill 50 enemies.
Gain command of a squad of rebels in the uprising.
Survive the second turret standoff in Nova Prospekt.
Get through the toxic tunnel under City 17 in Half-Life 2.
Survive the generator plaza standoff in chapter Anticitizen One.
Shut down the supression device by disabling its generators.

vecAchievedHidden.strDescription: Hit the trashcan cop with the can.

data.strFullDescription:
2004's [i]Half-Life 2[/i] was a landmark for PC gaming and the First Person Shooter, setting the standard for immersion, animation, and physics-based play for years.
Meticulously developed by Half-Life community member Filip Victor,[i] Half-Life 2: Update[/i] offers both long-time fans and first time players the most visually advanced, stable, and fully-featured version of [i]Half-Life 2[/i] to date in one free mod download.

[h2]Features:[h2]
[list][*]Complete lighting overhaul including enhanced lighting, more detailed world shadows, and full High Dynamic Range Lighting (HDR).
[*]New particle effects and improved fog.
[*]Countless bug fixes, correcting both visual and game-based issues.
[*]An extensive Community Commentary Mode featuring the voices of well-known Youtubers, including Caddicarus, Brutalmoose, Ricepirate, Balrog the Master, ProJared, and Ross Scott from [i]Freeman's Mind[/i] .
[*]Retains the iconic Half-Life 2 visual style and gameplay.
[*]All available in [u]one free standalone download![/u][/list]

[url=http://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/290930/manuals/HL2_Update_Brochure_Steam.pdf?t=1427308170[/url]
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/290930/extras/download_the_brochure3.png?t=1650307354[/img][/url]

[h2]Official Sponsors[h2]                                                                
[url=http://www.nvidia.com][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/290930/extras/Sponsor_Nvidia_Logo.png?t=1650307354[/img][/url] [url=http://www.originpc.com] [img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/290930/extras/ORIGIN1_logo.png?t=1650307354[/img][/url]  [url=www.evga.com][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/290930/extras/evg.png?t=1650307354[/img][/url]


[b]View the [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q9X7mNyTmu8]Trailer[/url] and the [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NI9aSFHJRO0]Comparison[/url]
 in stunning HD or 4K on YouTube.[/b]
data.strSnippet: A completely free and extensive community-developed update for Half-Life 2 featuring beautiful lighting, countless bug fixes, and a brand new Community Commentary Mode. With Half-Life 2: Update, thereâ€™s never been a better time to revisit City 17.
